item.title: Heidi add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "I learned this, at least, by my experiment: that if one advances confidently in the direction of his dreams, and endeavors to live the life which he has imagined, he will meet with a success unexpected in common hours." -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: Heidi add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Heidi add a quote by Frank Lloyd Wright
item.description: "Love is the virtue of the Heart, Sincerity is the virtue of the Mind, Decision is the virtue of the Will, Courage is the virtue of the Spirit." -- Frank Lloyd Wright

item.title: Heidi add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Heidi add a quote by Seth
item.description: "There are no limitations to the self except those you believe in." -- Seth

item.title: Heidi add a quote by Neale Donald Walsch
item.description: "Life begins at the end of your comfort zone." -- Neale Donald Walsch

item.title: Heidi add a quote by Dalai Lama
item.description: "The period of greatest gain in knowledge and experience is the most difficult period in one's life." -- Dalai Lama

item.title: Heidi add a quote by Tad Crawford
item.description: "We can respond creatively to what we experience as life-depriving and become richer in spirit for having met the challenge." -- Tad Crawford

item.title: Heidi add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Heidi add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Heidi add a quote by Dan Millman
item.description: "Your fears are not walls, but hurdles. Courage is not the absence of fear, but the conquering of it." -- Dan Millman

item.title: Heidi add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "When I let go of what I am, I become what I might be." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Heidi add a quote by Og Mandino
item.description: "Your only limitations are those you set up in your mind, or permit others to set up for you." -- Og Mandino

item.title: Heidi add a quote by Margaret Mead
item.description: "We are continually faced with great opportunities which are brilliantly disguised as unsolvable problems." -- Margaret Mead

item.title: Heidi add a quote by William Faulkner
item.description: "The man who removes a mountain begins by carrying away small stones." -- William Faulkner

item.title: Heidi add a quote by William James
item.description: "We don’t laugh because we’re happy, we’re happy because we laugh." -- William James

item.title: Heidi add a quote by Anne Wilson Schaef
item.description: "Laughter is like the human body wagging its tail." -- Anne Wilson Schaef

item.title: Heidi add a quote by Julia Cameron
item.description: "The voice of our original self is often muffled, overwhelmed, even strangled, by the voices of other people’s expectations." -- Julia Cameron

item.title: Heidi add a quote by Stephen C. Paul
item.description: "For all those years you’ve protected the seed. It’s time to become the beautiful flower." -- Stephen C. Paul

item.title: Heidi add a quote by Dale Carnegie
item.description: "You can conquer almost any fear if you will only make up your mind to do so. For remember, fear doesn't exist anywhere except in the mind." -- Dale Carnegie

item.title: Heidi add a quote by Walter Anderson
item.description: "Our lives improve only when we take chances - and the first and most difficult risk we can take is to be honest with ourselves." -- Walter Anderson

item.title: Heidi add a quote by Jim Allen
item.description: "Recognize that life is what you get when you’re born ... living is what you do with it." -- Jim Allen

item.title: Heidi add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "To weep is to make less the depth of grief." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Heidi add a quote by Erica Jong
item.description: "I have not ceased being fearful, but I have ceased to let fear control me." -- Erica Jong

item.title: Heidi add a quote by Richard Carlson
item.description: "Reflection is one of the most underused yet powerful tools for success." -- Richard Carlson

item.title: Heidi add a quote by Joseph Fort Newton
item.description: "People are lonely because they build walls instead of bridges." -- Joseph Fort Newton

item.title: Heidi add a quote by Rita Mae Brown
item.description: "I think the reward for conformity is that everyone likes you except yourself." -- Rita Mae Brown

item.title: Heidi add a quote by John Bunyan
item.description: "If we have not quiet in our minds, outward comfort will do no more for us…" -- John Bunyan

item.title: Heidi add a quote by Bill Copeland
item.description: "Try to be like the turtle -- at ease in your own shell." -- Bill Copeland

item.title: Heidi add a quote by Maxwell Maltz
item.description: "Loneliness is caused by an alienation from life. It is a loneliness from your real self." -- Maxwell Maltz
